extendedInfo.description: Looking for a dream home or a commercial space in Noida? You have reached the right place to get all your answers at a single tap.Favista is India's premier real estate advisory company whose representatives believe that each real estate property search experience should be simple and successful.* You can search for residential or commercial properties to buy or rent in Noida.* Only validated properties will be shown.* User can search properties in various parts of Noida.Features:* Introduces an augmented realty feature to show the Favista properties near by you with in 10 km!* Properties can be searched on maps!* User can also show interest in a particular property by calling/messaging/scheduling a visit/emailing and our sales team will assist you.* Share application with friends via email, facebook and twitter.* Browse validated images of homes which also includes detailed floor plan of the properties.
